ygData.subject: Re: New to Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a gay / lesbian / bi / trans guilds on The Nameless called Nameless Love.  It has a small core of active players and a much larger number of
ygData.messageBody:
There is a gay / lesbian / bi / trans guilds on The Nameless called
Nameless Love. It has a small core of active players and a much
larger number of occasional players. Many of its members have main
characters in other guilds (mostly The Nameless Of Mercy). People in
this guild communicate using the Yahoo Club:
http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/gayandlesbianeverquestfolk although
there is also a web site at http://www.namelesslove.com

Nameless Love has never had any connection to Mystic Alliance
although several players in Nameless Love on The Nameless server also
play on Rodcet Nife in Mystic Alliance.

Regards to all...

(Nameless Love Guild Officer) Dandee Lyon


--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Chris" <xman0@i...> wrote:
> Hey Tasco!
>
> I don't know if Mystic Alliance even exists. Did some searching
> around and I *think* they formed "Nameless Love" on the Nameless
> server.
>
> Currently NL has about 6-8 active members (that I know of) and we
> ROCKED last night! We had a full group. Everyone's got characters
in
> the 7-14 range... so groupings easy. A few higher level people, and
> their great for the assists.
>
> Anyhow, if you find anyone in Mystic Alliance lemme know, otherwise
> come join us on the Nameless!
>
> Current officers that i know of are Fliq and Galadorn. Check out
> Yahoo Clubs -
http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/gayandlesbianeverquestfolk
> for current info!
>
> -Archayne
>
>
> --- In EQ_rainbow@y..., Robert Coons <robert.coons@w...> wrote:
> > Morning everyone !
> >
> > I've just created a character on Rodcet Nife and am very
interested
> in
> > joining Mystic Alliance. Can someone give me a list of who to
look
> for on
> > the server that can bring me into the guild ? I've been on Mith
> Marr for the
> > last 18 months and have been meaning to come to Rodcet Nife for a
> long time.
> >
> > Thanks!
> > Tasco level 6 Druid - presently in Qeynos area
